add-a-song: Pridať pieseň zo spevníku do zoznamu médií.
add-a-video-explain: Pridať video z oficiálnej stránky Jehovových Svedkov do zoznamu médií. Zobrazujú sa tu najnovšie videá, ale v prípade potreby môžete tiež prehľadávať všetky videá.
add-media-audio-bible: Pridať audio nahrávky z Prekladu nového sveta Svätých písiem
add-media-audio-bible-explain: Vyberte konkrétnu biblickú knihu a kapitolu a stiahnite si zvukové nahrávky jej veršov.
add-media-study-bible: Pridať médiá z Biblie s poznámkami
add-media-study-bible-explain: Vyberte konkrétnu biblickú knihu a kapitolu na zobrazenie zoznamu študijných materiálov, ako sú obrázky, videá, mapy a historické odkazy.
advancedDescription: Nároční používatelia sa možno budú chcieť pohrať s týmito nastaveniami, ale predvolená konfigurácia je zvyčajne dosť dobrá.
also-look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Nájdite tiež toto tlačítko v pätičke M³:
app-description: Meeting Media Manager je multiplatformová aplikácia na zobrazovanie médií na zborových zhromaždeniach Jehovových svedkov. Je integrovaná s programom OBS Studio pre zobrazenie médií jedným kliknutím v sále Kráľovstva aj na Zoom. Vďaka svojim bohatým funkciám a intuitívnemu rozhraniu M³ znižuje pracovné zaťaženie audio/video služobníkov. Podporuje všetky teokratické formáty súborov, ako aj súbory PDF a bežné mediálne súbory. Môže doplniť alebo dokonca nahradiť knižnicu JW Library podľa potrieb vašeho zboru.
app-issues: Ak sa stretnete s akýmikoľvek problémami alebo ste našli chybu, vytvorte problém na našej stránke úložiska GitHub alebo nás kontaktujte prostredníctvom diskusií GitHub, kde podrobne opíšte problém. Čo najskôr sa vám ozveme.
applicationConfigurationDescription: Prispôsobte si správanie a vzhľad tejto aplikácie
archive-file-found: Súbory archívu musia byť spracované samostatne.
are-you-sure-delete: Ste si istý, že chcete vymazať "{mediaToDelete}"?
are-you-sure-delete-all: Naozaj chcete odstrániť všetky dodatočné média súbory pre zvolený deň?
are-you-sure-delete-cache: Naozaj chcete odstrániť všetky súbory vo vyrovnávacej pamäti?
are-you-sure-delete-unused-cache: Naozaj chcete odstrániť nepoužívané súbory z vyrovnávacej pamäte?
audio-bible-media: Zvukové nahrávky z Prekladu nového sveta
auto-update-app: Automaticky sťahovať a inštalovať aktualizácie aplikácie
auto-update-app-explain: Táto možnosť by mala byť vždy povolená, aby ste získali najnovšie funkcie, vylepšenia a opravy chýb.
autoStartAtLogin: Automaticky spustiť M³ pri štarte počítača
autoStartAtLogin-explain: M³ sa môže spustiť automaticky pri spustení počítača.
autoStartMusic: Automaticky spustiť hudbu na pozadí pred zhromaždením
autoStartMusic-explain: Hudba na pozadí sa začne prehrávať automaticky, ak je naplánované začatie zhromaždenia niekoľko minút alebo hodín po spustení M³.
baseUrl-explain: Zadajte adresu na prístup na oficiálnu webovú stránku Jehovových svedkov.
cacheFolder-explain: Vyberte priečinok na uloženie súborov vyrovnávacej pamäte, ako sú publikácie a médiá. Ak ho ponecháte prázdny, aplikácia ho nakonfiguruje automaticky.
cacheFolder-wizard: Ak si nie ste istí týmto nastavením, môžete prejsť na ďalší krok bez výberu priečinka. Predvolená konfigurácia je vhodná pre väčšinu používateľov.
change-tag-explain: Upraviť typ kategórie a štítok pre túto mediálnu položku.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-start-and-: Kliknutím naň môžete spustiť a zastaviť prehrávanie hudby na pozadí. Hudba sa začne prehrávať automaticky pred naplánovaným začiatkom zhromaždenia, keď sa spustí aplikácia M³, a pred začiatkom zhromaždenia sa tiež automaticky zastaví. Prehrávanie hudby na pozadí po záverečnej modlitbe však bude potrebné spustiť manuálne pomocou tohto tlačidla.
clicking-it-will-allow-you-to-temporaril: Kliknutím naň môžete dočasne skryť obrazovku s médiami/ročný text, a odkryť účastníkov Zoomu. Keď zobrazenie obrazovky Zoomu už nie je potrebné, môžete znova zobraziť ročný text pomocou rovnakého tlačidla.
clicking-the-close-button-again-will-clo: Opätovným kliknutím na rovnaké tlačidlo ukončíte M³.
coWeek-explain: Ak vyplnené, M³ automaticky presunie zhromaždenie uprostred týždňa na utorok v danom týždni. Preskočia sa aj médiá pre zborové biblické štúdium a preskočia sa záverečné piesne na zhromaždeniach v týždni a cez víkend.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-captu: Nakonfigurujte scénu v OBS Studio na zachytenie mediálneho okna.
configure-a-scene-in-obs-studio-to-show-: Nakonfigurujte scénu v OBS Studio tak, aby zobrazovala široký záber na pódium.
configure-the-websocket-plugin-in-obs-st: Budete musieť nakonfigurovať Websocket plugin v OBS Studio. Vyžaduje sa aj plugin Virtuálna kamera, takže sa uistite, že je tiež nainštalovaný a nakonfigurovaný.
congregation-lookup-explain: Zadajte kľúčové slová, ako je názov zboru, mesto alebo oblasť, v ktorej sa nachádza. Tieto informácie sa použijú na pokus o automatické načítanie plánu zhromaždení a jazyka.
congregationMeetingsDescription: Nastavenia týkajúce sa vášho zboru a plánu zhromaždení
congregationName-explain: Tento názov sa zobrazí v ponuke výberu profilu aplikácie.
convertFilesToMp4-explain: Ak je táto možnosť povolená, súbory bez videa sa pred exportom skonvertujú do formátu MP4. To zaisťuje kompatibilitu s natívnou funkciou zdieľania MP4 v aplikácií Zoom, ktorá ponúka jednoduchšie a kvalitnejšie prehrávanie médií v porovnaní so zdieľaním obrazovky.
currently-loading: Médiá pre tento dátum sa načítavajú.
custom-background-set: Zvolený obrázok sa teraz zobrazuje namiesto ročného textu.
custom-background-will-not-persist: Upozorňujeme, že ak aplikáciu ukončíte, vlastné pozadie sa neuloží.
darkMode-explain: Vynútiť, aby aplikácia používala svetlý alebo tmavý režim, alebo použiť predvolený režim systému
delete-media-explain: Vyberte túto možnosť, ak chcete odstrániť zvolenú mediálnu položku.
disableMediaFetching: Disable features for regular meetings and automatic media fetching
disableMediaFetching-explain: This setting should remain disabled in almost all cases to ensure that regular meeting media is downloaded automatically. Enabling this setting will require all media to be added manually. This setting should only be enabled in profiles that will be used exclusively for special events such as theocratic schools, assemblies, or conventions.
does-your-kingdom-hall-use-a-program-cal: Používa vaša sála Kráľovstva program OBS Studio?
doing-so-will-greatly-simplify-and-facil: Výrazne sa tým zjednoduší a uľahčí zdieľanie médií počas hybridných zhromaždení.
dont-forget-add-missing-media: Nezabudnite pridať chýbajúce piesne alebo médiá.
dont-forget-to-add-circuit-overseer-date: For best results, add the date of the circuit overseer's visit to the "{ congregationMeetings }" section in { settings }.
drag-and-drop-or-click-to-browse: Sem presuňte súbory myšou alebo ich pridajte kliknutím.
enableExtraCache: Ukladať video súbory spevníka do vyrovnávacej pamäte
enableExtraCache-explain: Uložte všetky videá spevníkov do vyrovnávacej pamäte, aby ste zlepšili výkon. Upozorňujeme, že sa tým zväčší veľkosť vyrovnávacej pamäte médií.
enableFolderWatcher: Povoliť monitorovanie dodatočného priečinka s médiami
enableFolderWatcher-explain: Táto funkcia monitoruje priečinok podľa vášho výberu a nájdené súbory automaticky pridáva do zoznamu médií.
enableKeyboardShortcuts-explain: Na zefektívnenie mediálnej prezentácie používajte klávesové skratky.
enableMediaAutoExport-explain: Automaticky exportujte médiá do zvoleného priečinka podľa dňa.
enableMediaDisplayButton-explain: Zobrazujte obrázky a videá v okne alebo na externej obrazovke. Ak sa používa v sále Kráľovstva, vo väčšine prípadov by to malo byť povolené.
enableMusicButton-explain: Prehrávajte piesne pred a po zhromaždení niekoľkými kliknutiami.
enableSubtitles-explain: Predvoliť povolenie tituliek pre všetky prehrávané videá.
enter-a-key-combination-now-using-your-k: Použite klávesnicu na vytvorenie klávesovej skratky.
enter-the-port-and-password-configured-i: Enter the port and password configured in OBS Studio's Websocket plugin.
errorDownloadingMeetingMedia: Nastala chyba pri sťahovaní médií na zhromaždenie
excludeFootnotes: Exclude media from footnotes in the Watchtower Study
excludeFootnotes-explain: Do not include videos or other media from footnotes in Watchtower articles.
excludeTh: Exclude all media from the Teaching brochure
excludeTh-explain: Do not include videos or other media from the Teaching brochure.
extra-media-item-explain: This media item was added manually
feel-free-to-browse-around-the-other-ava: Feel free to browse around the other available options, or if you prefer you can head right to the media playback screen and start using it to display media.
fileProcessError: There was an error processing this file
filetypeNotSupported: This file type is not yet supported
firstDayOfWeek-explain: Select which day of the week should be displayed first in a calendar week.
folderToWatch-explain: The folder that will be monitored for new media files. This folder must contain subfolders named by date (format: YYYY-MM-DD). Files in folders that don’t follow this convention will be ignored.
help-translate-new: The current media language is not available as a display language in M³. Would you like to help translate M³ for users who speak this language?
hide-from-list-explain: Hidden files can be restored at any time using the 'Add media' menu.
hideMediaLogo: Hide JW logo from media presentation window
hideMediaLogo-explain: This removes the square JW logo from the bottom right corner. If using at a Kingdom Hall, this should in most cases be disabled.
images-videos-explain: Photos, videos, audio files, PDFs documents, and other media files
in-what-language-should-media-be-downloa: In what language should media be downloaded?
includePrinted: Zahrnúť tlačené médiá ak sú k dispozícií
includePrinted-explain: Include additional images from the printed editions of publications that may not be available in the digital versions.
integrationsDescription: Configure integration with other apps and services
jw-playlist-explain: Playlist file exported from JW Library
jwpub-file-explain: Publication downloaded from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses
jwpub-file-found: JWPUB files must be processed separately.
jwpubNoMultimedia: The JWPUB file does not contain any multimedia
lang-explain: Choose the language in which meetings take place. This is the language that will be used to download and play media.
langFallback-explain: You can choose a secondary language here if media is often unavailable in the main language of the congregation.
langSubtitles-explain: This is the language in which subtitles will be downloaded and played.
latest-videos-from-jw-org: Latest videos from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses
local-media-explain-1: Add photos, videos, audio files, JW Library playlists, JWPUB files, or PDF documents from your computer and they will appear in the media list.
local-media-explain-2: All common media formats are supported.
localAppLang-explain: This is the language M³ will be displayed in. It won't affect the language in which media is downloaded.
look-for-this-button-in-m-s-footer: Look for this button in M³'s footer:
m-is-now-ready-to-be-used: M³ is now ready to be used.
make-sure-that-m-is-in-not-use-before-qu: Make sure that M³ is in not use before closing it.
maxRes-explain: Choose the maximum resolution for videos. Videos above this resolution will not be downloaded.
media-item-missing-explain: This media item is missing. To play it, add it using the 'Add media' menu or by dragging it into the media list from your computer.
mediaRetrievalAndPlaybackDescription: Configure meeting media download and playback settings.
meetingScheduleChangeDate-explain: Enter the date when the new meeting schedule should take effect. All meetings from this date on will follow the new schedule, and the old schedule will be permanently replaced.
meetingScheduleChangeMwDay-explain: Select the new day for the midweek meeting. Leave blank if the day will not change.
meetingScheduleChangeMwStartTime-explain: Select the new start time for the midweek meeting. Leave blank if the time will not change.
meetingScheduleChangeOnce: Apply schedule change to one week only
meetingScheduleChangeOnce-explain: Enable this to apply the schedule change to only one week, starting on the specified date. This is useful for one-time changes, such as during a circuit overseer's visit to a neighboring congregation. Otherwise, the schedule will be updated for all meetings as of the specified date.
meetingScheduleChangeWeDay-explain: Select the new day for the weekend meeting. Leave blank if the day will not change.
meetingScheduleChangeWeStartTime-explain: Select the new start time for the weekend meeting. Leave blank if the time will not change.
musicVolume-explain: Choose the volume of the background music playback. This allows you to set a lower volume for background music, while keeping the volume of other media high.
mwDay-explain: Choose the day on which the midweek meeting takes place.
mwStartTime-explain: Choose the time at which the midweek meeting starts.
next-day-with-media: Go to the first day with media
no-circuit-overseer-date-set: The date of the circuit overseer's visit is not set
no-media-files-for-section: There are no media items for this meeting section.
no-media-for-this-category: There is no media for this category
no-results-explain: You'll need to enter your congregation's information manually if the lookup is unsuccessful.
no-results-short-explain: You'll need to enter more than two characters to start searching.
noDownloadsInProgress: No downloads are currently in progress
notice-the-yeartext-is-now-being-display: You'll notice the yeartext is now being displayed on the external monitor! But let's keep going.
obs-studio-disconnected-banner: M³ is unable to connect to OBS Studio. Please ensure that OBS Studio is running and configured correctly.
obs-studio-is-a-free-app-used-to-manage-: OBS Studio is a free app used to manage camera and video feeds in many Kingdom Halls.
obsCameraScene: Prednastavená scéna zobrazenia v OBS Studio
obsCameraScene-explain: The scene in OBS Studio that will be used as the default stage view. As per latest direction, this should be a wide shot.
obsEnable-explain: Connect M³ to OBS Studio to enable automated switching between media and camera scenes.
obsHideIcons: Do not display icons in the scene switcher
obsHideIcons-explain: When enabled, icons will be hidden in the scene switcher. This may increase the legibility of scene names.
obsImageScene: Scene to display images in OBS Studio [optional]
obsImageScene-explain: A scene can be configured in OBS Studio specifically to display images, for example in a picture-in-picture style. If this is left blank, the default media scene will be used instead.
obsMediaScene: Scéna mediálneho okna v OBS Studio
obsMediaScene-explain: The scene in OBS Studio that will be used to broadcast media to Zoom participants.
obsPassword-explain: Find the configured password under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in OBS Studio.
obsPort-explain: Find the configured port under Tools > WebSocket Server Settings in OBS Studio.
obsQuickToggle-explain: When enabled, hovering over the OBS Studio button will open the scene switcher. This can be useful for quickly switching scenes in OBS Studio, especially if many scenes are configured.
obsSwitchSceneAfterMedia: Delay scene changes when playing media
obsSwitchSceneAfterMedia-explain: When enabled, OBS Studio will defer scene changes until after any currently playing media has finished. Note: enabling this option will also remove media and image scenes from the scene switcher.
once-the-scene-has-been-created-select-i: Once the scene has been created, select it here.
only-show-settings-that-are-not-valid: Only show settings that are not valid
pause-to-adjust-time: To enable scrubbing, the video must be paused
please-use-image-or-jwpub: Please select an image file or a JWPUB file that contains an image
profile-type-regular: In most cases, choosing "Regular" is the best option. This will create a profile that downloads media for all meetings automatically and also enables media presentation features that are most often used during congregation meetings.
profile-type-special: Choose "Other" if you are creating a profile for which no media should be automatically downloaded. Media will have to be manually added for use in this profile. This type of profile is used mostly for theocratic schools, assemblies, and other special cases.
receive-beta-updates: Receive early access to beta versions
receive-beta-updates-explain: Beta updates may contain unstable features and potential bugs. Do not enable this option on the computer used for live meetings.
rename-explain: Media items are not permanently renamed; the original name will be restored when the app is restarted.
repeat: This media item will loop continuously
repeat-media-item-explain: Choose this if the selected media item should play on a loop until it's manually stopped.
scene-not-found: A problem occurred while activating a scene in OBS Studio.
scene-not-found-explain: Please validate the configured scenes in the settings.
screen-access-required: Screen recording permissions are required for this feature
screen-access-required-explain: Please restart the app when screen recording permissions have been granted in System Settings.
select-a-custom-background: Choose an image that will be displayed as the background image instead of the yeartext. This would normally be used only on special occasions, such as the Memorial.
select-a-date-to-begin: Please select a date to begin.
select-s34mp-to-add-public-talk-media: Select an S-34mp JWPUB file downloaded from the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses to quickly access the Public Talk Media Playlist. The file will be cached and can be updated by browsing to an updated version at any time.
setupWizard.intro: M³ is an app designed to make your playing media at congregation meetings easy and stress-free. Let's configure a few things, and then we'll get on our way.
shortcutMediaNext-explain: Shortcut to skip to the next video or picture in the list. This has no effect if a video is currently playing.
shortcutMediaPauseResume-explain: Shortcut to pause or resume the currently playing video. This only takes effect if a video is currently playing.
shortcutMediaPrevious-explain: Shortcut to skip to the previous video or picture in the list. This has no effect if a video is currently playing.
shortcutMediaStop-explain: Shortcut to stop the currently playing video or hide the currently displayed picture. This only takes effect if media is currently being displayed.
shortcutMediaWindow-explain: Shortcut to quickly hide or show the media window.
shortcutMusic-explain: Shortcut to start or stop the background music.
show-hidden-media-explain: This will show any media that was previously hidden for the currently selected day.
some-media-items-are-hidden: Some media items have been hidden.
some-media-items-are-missing-explain: The JWPUB file was imported successfully. However, some media is not included in the file and could not be downloaded automatically. You can add this media manually if needed by using the 'Add media' menu or by dragging it into the media list from your computer.
some-songs-are-duplicated: Some songs appear more than once in the media list. Please check if this is intentional.
stop-playing-media-first: To navigate to a different page, please stop the media playback first.
stop-playing-media-first-explain: Page navigation is disabled while media is being presented.
stop-repeat-media-item: Do not loop this media item
stop-repeat-media-item-explain: Choose this if the selected media item should play until the end and then stop.
study-bible-media: Images, videos, charts and maps from the Study Bible
successfully-migrated-from-the-previous-: Successfully migrated from the previous version
sureStopVideo: Are you sure you want to stop the video?
the-name-of-your-congregation-or-group-w: The profile name will help you to quickly switch between profiles, if you ever decide to create more than one in the future.
there-are-no-media-items-for-the-selecte: There are no media items for the selected date.
this-will-only-delete-media-for-this-day: This action will only remove extra media for the selected day
this-will-speed-up-media-retrieval-for-m: This will speed up media retrieval for meeting media, but is not mandatory.
to-quickly-show-and-hide-zoom-participan: Tip: To ensure you're able to quickly show and hide Zoom participants on the TV screens when needed, make sure that the setting to "use dual monitors" in Zoom is enabled.
tryConfiguringFallbackLanguage: Try configuring a fallback language in the settings
update-available: A new version of M³ is available! We recommend updating to receive the latest features, bug fixes, and security updates.
use-the-import-button-to-add-media-for-t: Use the 'Add extra media' button to add media for this date, or select a different date to view the corresponding media for that day.
use-the-slider-below-to-adjust-the-start: Use the slider below to adjust the start and end time of this media item. This is useful for playing only certain parts of a video.
watched-media-item-explain: This media item was added from a monitored folder
weDay-explain: Choose the day on which the weekend meeting takes place.
weStartTime-explain: Choose the time at which the weekend meeting starts.
well-start-fetching-media-while-we-wrap-: We'll start fetching media while we wrap up with our initial setup.
what-are-your-meeting-days-and-times-wel: What are your meeting days and times? We'll use this information to display the media calendar.
what-kind-of-profile-is-this: Choose the type of profile you would like to create.
what-language-would-you-like-m-to-be-dis: What language would you like M³ to be displayed in?
when-you-are-done-presenting-the-website: When you no longer need to present the website, either close the website window, or click on the "Stop Mirroring" button in the top right corner of this window.
when-you-click-the-button-on-the-top-rig: When you click the "Open Website" button on the top right corner of this window, a new window will open to the official website of Jehovah's Witnesses.
would-you-like-to-enable-songbook-video-: Would you like to cache all songbook videos?
would-you-like-to-integrate-m-with-obs-s: Would you like to integrate M³ with OBS Studio?
you-can-navigate-the-website-before-pres: If necessary, you can navigate to a specific page before presenting it to the audience. When you're ready, press the "Start Mirroring" button on the top right corner of this window. What you see in the website window will now be displayed in the media window for the audience to see.
